summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, indicating that Epstein did not receive emails the previous day and requesting that Staley resend any messages sent. The email contains a confidentiality notice and suggests that the communication may be attorney-client privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, addressing Jes Staley regarding missed communications.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, who is asked to resend any emails sent the previous day.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley are in communication, indicating a relationship that may involve personal or professional matters.

keyFacts: The email was sent on April 3, 2010.
Jeffrey Epstein did not receive emails from Jes Staley the previous day.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
The communication is intended only for the use of the addressee, Jes Staley.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email content is prohibited.
